biotools.summary: ScerTF catalogs over 1,200 position weight matrices (PWMs) for 196 different yeast transcription factors. ScerTF is useful for a wide range of problems, such as linking regulatory sites with transcription factors, identifying a transcription factor based on a user-input matrix, finding the genes bound/regulated by a particular TF, and finding regulatory interactions between transcription factors.
